name: Gladiators (phansonloc1999, rumis)
description:
Battle against other gladiators. No one is the hero here, fight only for your own survival, blood and glory.

Controls:
  • Movement: A, D for Player 1 and Left arrow, Right arrow for Player 2
  • Attacking: C, V for Player 1 and ? or : for Player 2
  • Blocking: V for Player 1 and . for Player 2

A 2d fighting game made in 72 hours for . The theme is 'Rome' and the limitation is 'The player is the villain'.

Credits:

- Phan Son Loc ( https://phansonloc1999.itch.io/ )

- Rumis ( https://rumis.itch.io/ )

This project use one of VEXED's assets pack. VEXED haves some of the most unique assets packs out there so please check them out.

Notes:

This game is far from perfect. We will be more than happy if you point out out flaws and help us learn from our mistakes. Please drop a comment and give us your feedback, we will be glad to listen to what you have to say. ( PS: You can start by rating our game from a scale of 0 to 10 ! )
